thread.title: Real Madrid boss reacts to James Rodriguez outburst: Man Utd and Chelsea keen on deal
thread.title_full: Real Madrid boss reacts to James Rodriguez outburst: Man Utd and Chelsea keen on deal

title: Real Madrid boss reacts to James Rodriguez outburst: Man Utd and Chelsea keen on deal
text:
Click through the gallery to reveal the most expensive transfers of all time When you don’t play in a final, you get angry Zidane on Rodriguez 
But the boss says the 25-year-old's comments have not affected his standing in the side. 
“When you don’t play in a final, you get angry," Zidane said ahead of Real's Copa del Rey clash with Sevilla tomorrow. 
"I understand that sometimes it’s difficult, but it’s difficult for everyone. GETTY Zinedine Zidane (left) says he wants to keep Man Utd and Chelsea target James Rodriguez at Real GETTY Zidane (left) says he understands why Rodriguez is angry 
“It’s already in the past. Now we want to look at what lies ahead. 
“We’ve talked about [his situation], he also said that he wanted to stay here, at the best club in the world. 
“There’s nothing more to talk about, we’re going to continue working, that’s what’s important." Related articles
